vWashington House Rabbit Newsv

Volume 6 Issue 4 December 1997

VISIT THE HRS ADOPTION CENTER

Hop on over to the HRS adoption center at the Best Little Rabbit Rodent and Ferret House, in Seattle. We're located on Lake City Way NE, just south of NE 145th Street. Visit the foster buns pictured on page 4. We have rabbit food, fresh timothy hay, rabbit condos, and all sorts of gifts available for bunnies and their people. Excellent rabbit boarding and grooming services are available too. Visit us and let us know you're an HRS member.

 

Best Little Rabbit Rodent & Ferret House

14325 Lake City Way Northeast

Seattle, WA 98125

(206) 365-9105
